core.name: Advanced AI-Driven UI Adaptation
core.description: Integrates emotional intelligence, NLP, and quantum-inspired optimization for highly adaptive and responsive UI.

core.name: Immersive and Inclusive UI Experience
core.description: Utilizes VR simulation, accessibility features, and BCI for an inclusive and immersive UI experience.

supporting.name: Culturally Adaptive and Transparent Design System
supporting.description: Incorporates blockchain for design ledger and cultural adaptation for UI elements.

supporting.name: Synthetic Data for UI Training
supporting.description: Generates synthetic data for UI model training and validation.

integration.name: Edge AI and Federated Learning for UI
integration.description: Utilizes edge computing and federated learning for enhanced UI performance and data privacy.

analytics.name: Comprehensive UI Analytics and Optimization
analytics.description: Integrates predictive analytics, user behavior analysis, A/B testing automation, and XAI insights for data-driven UI optimization.
